description.en: You will need the same shoelace for this challenge just like for the previous one. Now your task is to open a closed door with the help of a shoelace attached to the door handle.

Your robot mustn't drop the shoelace.
You have got 3 trials.

You managed to open the door once. = Good job! Let's try again.
You managed to open the door twice. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You managed to open the door three out of the three trials. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You managed to open the door once. = 5 points
You managed to open the door twice. = 10 points
You managed to open the door three out of the three trials. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
